item.description:
This will be a planning meeting for a photo shoot event. I have a handbag boutique who will loan us bags for the shoot. We will discuss the date (s), location and roles of the particiapants for the upcoming event.

Concept ideas....not final, we will discuss and determine as a group.

Concept A- The Ladylike Bag

Concept B- Animal instinct (snake, aligator bags)

concept C- all that shine (sequinned, crystal, ect ornamented bags)

Please bring your ideas for two handbag photosessions - one with models, one without.

This event can be 1-3 parts depending upon the concepts agreed upon.

Please remember, attending the planning events is key to creating a successful photo event. All decisions will will be determined by members who attend the event.

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: Planning session for Its in the bag photo event
